Articles.Content:
Mm that\'s a good point Deadshot462.

SQUAD can always try it. ^^

My sister works at NASA\'s Goddard SFC as some kind of education specialist. I\'m going to contact her and see what she might be able to do in getting us the contacts we need to bring KSP to NASA\'s attention.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
somebody contact mat goring(simpsons!)

How many people have actually bought KSP so far? I\'m thinking of making a video about it too. Though I only have 10 or soo views a day

http://www.youtube.com/user/NannerAirCraft?feature=mhee

hey doesnt matter how many views ya get per day, im used to gettin about 40-ish veiws on my vids but since i started doin PZ and KSP my views have gone thru the roof (relatively, of course)

get as many as you can up there, hell maybe we can even do a youtube challenge type megathread like the one we have now but for LP\'ers

Once I have prizes I can offer the community, I plan to run some contests and one of them will likely be a Best Let\'s Play from a Community Member.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

1, what prizes?

2. i am now a member of the minecraft technic pack forum so can advitise ksp there

Popeter, I don\'t have any prizes. If and when Squad chooses to offer something I will make a contest announcement. Until then it\'s just an idea.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

The price is a limited edition of KSP. It includes 2 Jeb\'s! ;P

Capt\'n Skunky, do you know if it\'s allowed to use screenshots from the KSP home page for a poster? I\'m trying to make on myself with some text so I can hang them around my city.

But I don\'t know which of the content is intellectual property... I could of course use my own screenshots but I\'m trying to to make a poster that looks a lot like the KSP home page layout.

If I can\'t use it then I\'ll make something different.

I think we need to wait on word from Squad before making and distributing posters, even if they are free. They may have various things in mind already.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Aah nice, then I will wait. I will go on with advertising KSP on twitter and facebook.

Thanks for the fast reply!
you want me to help admin the facebook page?
What about someone making a trailer for KSP, showcasing the game, showcasing the things that are possible with mods, and post it on youtube as: 'E3 showcase: Kerbal Space Program'?

What about someone making a trailer for KSP, showcasing the game, showcasing the things that are possible with mods, and post it on youtube as: 'E3 showcase: Kerbal Space Program'?

As long as it has the 1812 overture in the background and plenty of launch failures.
Would it be okay for me to buy possibly 10 or so KSP\'s to give to people?

I think we need to wait on word from Squad before making and distributing posters, even if they are free. They may have various things in mind already.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hehe, I won\'t be alone anymore, as only player who didn\'t order the game, but got it from the devs .
ive just wrote an essay on the project zomboid forums why people should check this game out, hopefully that should bring in a few more pennies for you squad
I also have a friend that works for NASA. Let\'s see if I can get KSP on his radar, shall we?

Would it be okay for me to buy possibly 10 or so KSP\'s to give to people?

There\'s no limit on how many copies you can buy. Once you have bought them, they are your to do what you want with including giving them away.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

There\'s no limit on how many copies you can buy. Once you have bought them, they are your to do what you want with including giving them away.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

i said that and then got a warning for piracy >

Really? The last time it was discussed some mods told us we aren\'t allowed to give-away copies that has been paid for through 1 account.

We needed to wait till SQUAD would make a gift system. I guess that isn\'t the case any more?

popeter, you were warned because you made the implication of piracy. We take those issues very seriously and it\'s no joking matter. You\'re talking about take food from the mouths of the devs that we have all come to know and love.

As far as know, you can\'t buy multiple copies with the same account. You can, however, create a new account, purchase the game, then give that account away. I see nothing wrong with that since as far as Squad can see, everything is being done legit.

Yes, it would be best if we wait for Squad to provide a gifting mechanism, but I don\'t see any issue with the above method in the meantime.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Aah right, yes I remember that you are allowed to give away the account.

I forgot that, thanks Capt\'n Skunky.
And it works well, i\'m sure Spearka didn\'t mind acting as test subject.

I also have a friend that works for NASA. Let\'s see if I can get KSP on his radar, shall we?

I introduced KSP to two of my teachers, both of which have a friend that works at NASA.
What about making an official youtube ksp channel? Would that help in any way?
